description: The Inventory Plugin for Symantec Management Agent prior to 7.6 POST HF7, 8.0 POST HF6, or 8.1 RU7 may be susceptible to a privilege escalation vulnerability, which is a type of issue that allows a user to gain elevated access to resources that are normally protected at lower access levels.

product.name: Inventory Plugin for Symantec Management Agent

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Prior to 7.6 POST HF7, 8.0 POST HF6, or 8.1 RU7
